item.title: Monitoring
item.description: Choria Broker is just one process running in your server, the command systemctl status choria-broker will show a basic overview of the process running, you should have basic monitoring for the process in place. Prometheus Metrics By default, the broker does not expose any monitoring metrics, if you set the plugin.choria.stats_port configuration to a port number it will listen on that port. You can listen on non localhost by setting plugin.
